actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to repeal subsection (c) of section 245 of the Immigration and Nationality Act, to permit adjustment of status of persons from the Western Hemisphere on the same basis as other aliens.

summary.text: Makes applicable to persons from the Western Hemisphere specified provisions of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to the adjustment of status of nonimmigrants to that of persons admitted for permanent residence. (Repeals 8 U.S.C. 1255(c))

titles.title: A bill to repeal subsection (c) of section 245 of the Immigration and Nationality Act, to permit adjustment of status of persons from the Western Hemisphere on the same basis as other aliens.
